line.text: %PLAYER%: Mystique, what are you doing here in the jungle by yourself?
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Mystique, we were looking for you. Are you all right?

line.text: %Mystique%: Looking for my friend Destiny. She came to the Savage Land because she sensed Apocalypse was going to start a world war. Destiny hoped this land would be spared.
line.textb: %Mystique%: I'm fine, but I'm worried about Destiny. She came to the Savage Land because she had a vision that Apocalypse would start a world war. She had hoped to escape the danger. But I haven't heard from her in a very long time.

line.text: %PLAYER%: So Destiny's mutant power is to see into the future?
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Then why don't we search for her together?

line.text: %Mystique%: Yes. Now if we're done playing twenty questions I'd like to continue my search for her.
line.textb: %Mystique%: No. We'll cover more ground if I go alone. Good luck in your search.
